roleset.name: to not put to use effectively
roleset.note: UNDERUSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'underuse' based on instances from Webtext 25.2, Compare to frames file for 'underutilize'. (from underuse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Agentless passive from Webtext
example.text: [These stamps]-2 have been underused *-2 over the past few years, forming a large reserve in the market.
example.arg: forming a large reserve in the market
